output: A group of friends radiate joy with wide smiles on their faces, clad in comfortable casual attire. The warm glow of golden hour bathes them as they stand on a rugged cliffside, overlooking the vast expanse of the ocean at twilight. Lush green grass frames their silhouettes against the vibrant sunset sky, painting the horizon with hues of orange and purple.  Let the image capture the pure feeling of friendship and exhilarating freedom as they revel in this breathtaking moment together.
